summary: The state of Texas is divided into 254 counties.
full_text: Barnard Elliot Bee, Sr.  was an attorney and politician. A native of South Carolina, he moved to the Southwest in 1836, where he and his family were early settlers in the Republic of Texas. He became a political leader there, serving in several political appointee positions in the republic.
title: Barnard E. Bee, Sr.
